snippet.title: The Electrifying Incident - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist The Electrifying Incident: A Monster Mini-Expedition demo on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3352300/The_Electrifying_Incident_A_Monster_MiniExpedition/

The reactor is malfunctioning!

Explore the facility and manipulate the many electrical hazards and locked doors to find a way deeper, towards the source of the problem. Your only tool: a mechanical grabber-arm allowing you to lift and move boxes from afar.

Think hard, because the reactor could go into meltdown at any moment.
